definition.text: Limit order is the section of the data structure that keeps track of the properties of a specific limit order, as defined in the trading system.

translations.text: Limit order es la sección de la estructura de datos que realiza un seguimiento de las propiedades de un Limit Order específico, como se define en el trading system.

paragraphs.text: Each limit order defined in the trading system must reference the data structure of a limit order in the trading engine.
